official_title: To amend the Truth in Lending Act to require 90 days notice before changing the annual percentage rate of interest applicable on any credit card account or before changing the index used to determine such rate, and for other purposes.
short_title: Credit Card Interest Rate Change Disclosure Act

summary.text: Credit Card Interest Rate Change Disclosure Act - Amends the Truth in Lending Act prescriptions governing credit card accounts to mandate a 90-day advance notice to the consumer regarding: (1) any increase in the annual percentage rate of interest; or (2) any change in the index used to determine such rate of interest.Prescribes guidelines under which a freeze is imposed upon interest rate terms and fees on cards canceled by the consumer as a result of such notice.
